user.title: EG4 Web Monitor Setup
user.description: Connect your EG4 cloud account for full access to all features including GridBOSS, Quick Charge, and firmware updates. You can add local devices later for faster polling.

data_description.dst_sync: Automatically synchronize Daylight Saving Time settings to your inverter based on your Home Assistant timezone
data_description.library_debug: Enable DEBUG logging for the pylxpweb library (shows API requests, responses, and internal library operations)

cloud_add_local.title: Add Local Devices?
cloud_add_local.description: Your cloud connection is ready. You can optionally add local devices for faster polling (5-second updates via Modbus/Dongle vs 30-second cloud polling).

local_device_type.title: Select Device Connection
local_device_type.description: Choose how your device is connected locally.

network_scan_config.title: 网络扫描设置
network_scan_config.description: 扫描本地网络以查找 {brand_name} 设备。Modbus 设备（端口 502）可完全识别。WiFi 加密狗候选设备（端口 8000）需要手动输入序列号。

data.scan_dongle: 扫描 WiFi 加密狗（端口 8000）

data_description.ip_range: CIDR 表示法的网络范围（例如 192.168.1.0/24）。从 Home Assistant 网络自动检测。

network_scan_progress.title: 正在扫描网络...
network_scan_progress.description: 正在扫描本地网络以查找 {brand_name} 设备。这可能需要一些时间。

network_scan_results.title: 找到 {device_count} 个设备

network_scan_empty.title: 未找到设备
network_scan_empty.description: {scanned_range} 的网络扫描未找到 {brand_name} 设备。您可以手动输入连接详情。

local_modbus.description: Enter the IP address of your Modbus TCP gateway. Device serial, model, and firmware are automatically detected.

local_dongle.title: Connect via WiFi Dongle
local_dongle.description: Enter the dongle connection details. The dongle serial is printed on the device label (also the WiFi AP name). Note: Recent firmware updates may block this access.

reconfigure_cloud_remove.title: Remove Cloud Connection
reconfigure_cloud_remove.description:
This will remove cloud credentials from your configuration. Your local devices will continue to work.

Features that require cloud and will be disabled:
- Quick Charge switch
- GridBOSS/MID device sensors
- Firmware update notifications

All other controls (Battery Backup, AC Charge, SOC limits, etc.) work locally via Modbus registers.

reconfigure_device_remove.description: Select the device to remove from this configuration.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to {brand_name} Web Monitor. Please check your network connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check the logs for more details.
error.no_plants: No solar stations/plants found in your account. Please ensure you have at least one station configured in your {brand_name} Web Monitor account.
error.invalid_plant: The selected station/plant is no longer available. Please select a different station.
error.timeout: Connection to {brand_name} Web Monitor timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.modbus_not_installed: The pymodbus library is not installed. Please install it using: pip install pymodbus
error.modbus_timeout: Modbus connection timed out. Please verify the IP address and ensure the Modbus gateway is powered on and connected.
error.modbus_connection_failed: Failed to connect to Modbus gateway. Please check: (1) IP address is correct, (2) port 502 is not blocked, (3) Modbus TCP is enabled on the gateway.
error.dongle_timeout: WiFi dongle connection timed out. Please verify the IP address and ensure the dongle is connected to your network.
error.dongle_connection_failed: Failed to connect to WiFi dongle. Please check: (1) IP address is correct, (2) port 8000 is not blocked, (3) dongle firmware supports local access (recent updates may block this).
error.duplicate_serial: A device with this serial number has already been added to this installation.
error.serial_mismatch: The device at this address has a different serial number than expected. This may indicate a device swap or misconfiguration.
error.invalid_ip_range: 无效的 IP 范围。请使用 CIDR 表示法（例如 192.168.1.0/24）或范围（例如 192.168.1.1-192.168.1.254）。仅允许私有 IP 范围。
error.no_scan_type_selected: 请至少选择一种扫描类型（Modbus 或加密狗）。
error.duplicate_transport: A device at this address and port has already been added. Each local connection must use a unique host:port combination.

abort.already_configured: This {brand_name} Web Monitor station is already configured. Each station requires a separate integration instance.
abort.reauth_successful: Reauthentication successful! Your {brand_name} Web Monitor integration is now reconnected.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Reconfiguration successful! Your {brand_name} Web Monitor settings have been updated.
abort.entry_not_found: Configuration entry not found. The integration may have been removed. Please add it again from the Integrations page.
abort.serial_already_configured: Inverter {serial} is already configured in "{entry_title}". Remove that entry first, or use the Reconfigure flow to change connection types.

init.title: {brand_name} Web Monitor Options
init.description: Configure polling intervals for your {brand_name} Web Monitor integration. Sensor updates control how often device data is fetched. Parameter refresh controls how often configuration settings are synced.

data_description.sensor_update_interval: How often to poll for sensor updates ({min_sensor_interval}-{max_sensor_interval} seconds). Lower values provide faster updates but increase API load.
data_description.parameter_refresh_interval: How often to refresh inverter parameters like SOC limits and charge settings ({min_param_interval}-{max_param_interval} minutes).

refresh_data.name: Refresh Data
refresh_data.description: Force an immediate refresh of device data from the {brand_name} API, bypassing the normal polling interval.

entry_id.name: Configuration Entry ID
entry_id.description: The configuration entry ID to refresh. If not provided, all {brand_name} Web Monitor integrations will be refreshed.

entry_not_found.message: Configuration entry {entry_id} not found. Please verify the entry ID is correct.

entry_not_loaded.message: Configuration entry {entry_id} is not loaded. Please ensure the integration is properly configured and running.

no_coordinators.message: No {brand_name} coordinators found to refresh. Please ensure at least one {brand_name} Web Monitor integration is configured and loaded.
